metadata.description: Collection of 10 Claude Code plugins for documentation, AI engineering, code review, UI/UX design, git workflows, Google Stitch prompting, Spec-Driven Development, and language-specific programming

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Quality control and workflow orchestration utilities

plugins.name: ai
plugins.description: AI engineering toolkit for production-ready LLM applications

plugins.name: review
plugins.description: Code quality review tools for development teams

plugins.name: ui
plugins.description: UI/UX design and design system toolkit

plugins.name: google-stitch
plugins.description: Claude + Google Stitch prompting toolkit (prompt authoring + session management)

plugins.name: git
plugins.description: Git workflow automation (commit, PR, branching, changelog)

plugins.name: specprep
plugins.description: AI meta-prompt framework for Spec Kit workflow optimization

plugins.name: design-intent
plugins.description: Design Intent for Spec-Driven Development - Build React prototypes with AI while maintaining design consistency

plugins.name: lang
plugins.description: Language-specific programming skills (Bash, Python, Rust, TypeScript)
